# JavaScript
[![blog.nimoc.io](http://blog.nimoc.io/notice/index.svg)](http://blog.nimoc.io/notice/index.html)

 `constructor.prototype` 

 Popup  JavaScript 
## alert

****

``` js
var Popup=function(){
}
Popup.prototype.alert=function(message){
    this.iMessageCount++;
    alert(message+'~alert'+this.iMessageCount+'');    
}
Popup.prototype.iMessageCount=0;
var oNimo=new Popup();
oNimo.alert('nimo!');//  alert 1
oNimo.alert('Nice to meet you,I am Nimo!');//  alert 2
```


1.  Popup
2.  Popup  alert  iMessageCount 
3.  iMessageCount 
4. oNimo oNimo 2


1. nimo!~alert1
2. Nice to meet you,I am Nimo!~alert2

****



```
var oDemo=new Popup();
oDemo.alert('demo!'); //alert1  
```


1. oDemooDemo2


1. demo!~alert1

oDemo  alert 3 alert 1
## debug

 bug 

``` js
console.log(oNimo);
console.log(oDemo);
```

![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3949015/7004697/0f1560d4-dca2-11e4-8c19-0668203b9000.png)
 iMessageCount 0 oNimo  oDemo  iMessageCount 21 `this.iMessageCount++` 
###  bug

 `this.iMessageCount++` 



``` js
this.iMessageCount++
this.iMessageCount=this.iMessageCount+1
this.iMessageCount=this.constructor.prototype.iMessageCount+1
```


1. 
2. iMessageCountiMessageCount+1
3. iMessageCountiMessageCount+1iMessageCount

 `oDemo`  `Popup`  `Popup.prototype.iMessage` 

 constructor  prototype 



 constructor  protorype 



 `this.constructor.prototype.iMessageCount++`



``` js
var Popup=function(){
}
Popup.prototype.alert=function(message){
    this.constructor.prototype.iMessageCount++;
    alert(message+'~alert'+this.iMessageCount+'');    
}
Popup.prototype.iMessageCount=0;
var oNimo=new Popup();
oNimo.alert('nimo!');//  alert 1
oNimo.alert('Nice to meet you,I am Nimo!');//  alert 2

var oDemo=new Popup();
oDemo.alert('demo!'); //alert3
```

Page._content: # JavaScript-replace [![blog.nimoc.io](http://blog.nimoc.io/notice/index.svg)](http://blog.nimoc.io/notice/index.html) replaceString ## : `String.replace(searchValue,replaceValue)` 1. String: 2. searchValue 3. replaceValue: ## ``` javascript 'I am loser!'.replace('loser','hero') //I am hero! ``` loserhero2loserhero ``` javascript 'I am loser,You are loser'.replace('loser','hero'); //I am hero,You are loser ``` ## ``` javascript 'I am loser,You are loser'.replace(/loser/g,'hero') //I am hero,You are hero ``` globaltrueloserhero ## `replaceValue` | | | | :-- | :-- | | $& | | | $` | | | $' | | | $1,$2,$3,,$n | | ### $& ``` javascript var sStr='replace'; sStr.replace(//,'{$&}'); //{}replace ``` ### $`$' ``` javascript 'abc'.replace(/b/,"$`");//aac 'abc'.replace(/b/,"$'");//acc ``` ### ``` javascript 'nimoc@126.com'.replace(/(.+)(@)(.*)/,"$2$1")//@nimoc ``` ## replaceValue `String.replace(searchValue,replaceValue)` **replaceValue**. replaceValueargumentsn+3n **** ``` javascript function logArguments(){ console.log(arguments);//["nimoc@126.com", "nimoc", "@", "126.com", 0, "nimoc@126.com"] return '' } console.log( 'nimoc@126.com'.replace(/(.+)(@)(.*)/,logArguments) ) ``` **** 1. nimoc@126.com,) 2. `"nimoc", "@", "126.com"`/nimo/arguments 3. 0 4. (nimoc@126.com) ### A-G ``` javascript 'JAVASCRIPT'.replace(/[A-G]/g,function(){ return arguments[0].toLowerCase(); })//JaVaScRIPT ``` ### ``` javascript ';demo'.replace(/\'[^']+\'/g,function(){ var sResult=arguments[0]; console.log(sResult);//'' sResult=sResult.replace(/\'/g,''); console.log(sResult);// return sResult; })//demo ``` ## ### Thisnimoc-JavaScript `TJhaivsaNSicmroijpst` [](https://github.com/nimoc/blog/issues/15) NimoGithub[https://github.com/nimoc/blog/issues/2](https://github.com/nimoc/blog/issues/2)

#  TypeScript  


[![blog.nimoc.io](http://blog.nimoc.io/notice/index.svg)](http://blog.nimoc.io/notice/index.html)

>  test   expect ,, expect 


## 

.

 `filterZeroValue` :

>  `filterZeroValue` , `filterZeroValue`  `list.filter`.  

 JavaScript :

```ts
/*
 * '
 * @param list
 * @return notZeroValueList
 * */
function jsFilterZeroValue(list) {
    return list.filter(function (item) {
        switch (typeof item) {
            case "string":
                return item != ""
            break
            case "number":
                return item != 0
                break
            default:
            throw new Error("filterZeroValue: list[] item must be string or number" )
        }
    })
}

test("jsFilterZeroValue", function () {
    expect(jsFilterZeroValue(["a","","c"])).toStrictEqual(["a","c"])
    expect(jsFilterZeroValue([1,0,3])).toStrictEqual([1,3])
})


```


3

```js
function jsFilterZeroValue() {
    return list.filter((item)=> {return !!item})
}
```


 string number ,.


## TypeScript 

> ,

```ts

function tsFilterZeroValue<T>(list: T[]): T[] {
    return list.filter(function (item) {
        switch (typeof item) {
            case "string":
                return item != ""
                break
            case "number":
                return item != 0
                break
            default:
                throw new Error("filterZeroValue: list[] item must be string or number")
        }
    })
}


test("tsFilterZeroValue", function () {
    expect(tsFilterZeroValue(["a","","c"])).toStrictEqual(["a","c"])
    expect(tsFilterZeroValue([1,0,3])).toStrictEqual([1,3])
})

```

 `<T>(list: T[]): T[]` ,. `number[]` `string[]` .


### 

,.

> ,.

```ts

function unionTypeFilterZeroValue(list: string[] | number[]) :string[] | number[] {
    let output = []
    for (let i= 0;i<list.length;i++ ) {
        const item = list[i]
        switch (typeof item) {
            case "string":
                if (item != "") {
                   output.push(item)
                }
                break
            case "number":
                if (item != 0) {
                    output.push(item)
                }
                break
            default:
                throw new Error("filterZeroValue: list[] item must be string or number")
        }
    }
    return output
}


test("unionTypeFilterZeroValue", function () {
    expect(unionTypeFilterZeroValue(["a","","c"])).toStrictEqual(["a","c"])
    expect(unionTypeFilterZeroValue([1,0,3])).toStrictEqual([1,3])
})


```


### TypeScript filterZeroValue 

 `tsFilterZeroValue`  `unionTypeFilterZeroValue` ,
 TypeScript . TypeScript ,
 TypeScript .

TypeScript.

 

```ts

function stringListFilterZeroValue(list: string[]) :string[] {
    return list.filter(function (v) {
        return v != ""
    })
}

function numberListFilterZeroValue(list: number[]) :number[] {
    return list.filter(function (v) {
        return v != 0
    })
}

test("stringAndNumberlistFilterZeroValue", function () {
    expect(stringListFilterZeroValue(["nimo","","nico"])).toStrictEqual(["nimo","nico"])
    expect(numberListFilterZeroValue([1,0,3])).toStrictEqual([1,3])
})

```


>  TypeScript

"",,.

bug:
 
```ts

function updateSQL(id: string, names: string[]) :{sql:string, values:any[]} {
    const updateValue = stringListFilterZeroValue(names)
    //  updateSQL  names   ages int[]
    // stringListFilterZeroValue 
    //  unionTypeFilterZeroValue 

    // names  
    // , updateValue  string[]
    //  unionTypeFilterZeroValue 
    //  JSON.stringify(string[])  JSON.stringify(number[]) 
    // ,  values  sql  any[]
    return {
        sql: `UPDATE tableName SET names = ? WHERE id = ?`,
        values: [JSON.stringify(updateValue), id],
    }
}



test("updateSQL", function (){
    expect(updateSQL("1", ["nimo", "nico"])).toStrictEqual(
        {
            sql: "UPDATE tableName SET names = ? WHERE id = ?",
            values: [
                '["nimo","nico"]',
                "1",
            ],
        }
    )
})


```
